messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
517 William G. Drive.
Okay, what's the problem? Tell me exactly what happened.
The K-PAC police chief was having a vehicle pulled across the street, and the residents came out and shot him.
He shot him?
Yes, he's on the ground.
Okay, where's the man that was shooting?
He's back in the house.
We do have a county sheriff on the scene.
Okay, okay, we've got help on the way.
Thank you.
Uh-huh.
Yeah, we got an officer down in K-PAC right now.
William D. Drive, right?
Yep.
Okay, we got help on the way. He's fired, officer down. He's been hit.
Is the man still shooting?
Yeah, yeah. The chief's been shot.
Okay, you're all right. We got help on the way.
St. Clair County 9-1-1. What is the address of the emergency? Go ahead.
The chief of police has been shot. It's at 519 William G.
Okay, I know. We've got people on the way.
Do you know the address there?
519 William G. He's been shot twice. Once in the arm, once in the chest.
Okay, can you see where's the shooter?
I think he's in the house.
Is anyone else been injured?
No, not that I know.
Okay, we've got people just waiting to get there so that they don't get shot.
Okay, because the fire department isn't here yet.
Well, they can't go in if there's still a shooter.
Okay, thanks.
9-1-1, this is Ray.
Hi, Ray, yes.
Ray, I'm aware. We've got help on the way.
Get me the fire department over here. I'm dying, I'm dying.
Ray, are you still in the line of fire?
Yeah.
Ray, we got them coming. Everybody's coming, Ray. Hang on.
I'm dying, man. I'm going.
I know, buddy. Hang on, buddy. We got help coming for you, okay?
I can't breathe.
I know, Ray. We got everybody coming, okay?
Can you somehow get out of the way?
If the police car pulls up here, he can get me out of the way. Tell him to pull up here.
I can't move. I can't breathe. Tell him, yeah, to pull up.
Ray, hang in there. We got help coming.
Is the ambulance able to pull up and get you, Ray?
Yeah, if they pull up.
Have them pull right up to you, Ray.
Hurry, hurry.
Hang on, buddy. It's going to be all right.
All right, Ray. They're coming. They're coming.
I'm scared.
I understand. Hang tight.
Any units in the area of K-PAC? We have an officer down on William G. Drive.
41 is responding from Memphis.
Clear 41. Any other units in the K-PAC area?
Yes, I can respond from County Line in the management.
247 Chiefs down in front of the house. I'm hit in the head. We need backup.
Clear 247. We have an officer down on William G. Officers down, K-PAC.
Six three on en-route to officers down. Forty-seven to officers down, William G. Drive.
All units, two officers down, K-PAC. Officers down, William G. Drive.
Clear any units en-route?
Respond from Marysville and then route two four.
247 advising shots are being fired. K-PAC Chiefs is down in front of the residence. The suspect is inside. I'm hit in the head. I'm at my vehicle.
Clear, 247. You've been hit, Chiefs down in front of the residents. Units responding.
Clear any units en-route.
145, do you confirm the suspect is down, is that correct?
Suspect is still inside the residence.
Negative, suspect is still inside.
Clear, we're going to need to notify SRT.
Clear 145, notify SRT.
